price: Hindi sila sumasampalataya rito hanggang sa makita nila ang pagdurusang masakit.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
